view.user.title: User
view.apps.title: Applications
view.noApiKey: You do not have a registered API key. Please register one.
view.welcome:
No API key registered.
[Set API key](command:squarecloud.setApiKey)

generic.wait: Please wait a moment before making new requests.

tutorial.label: First open the "SquareCloud Dashboard", then go to "My Account" and finally click "Regenerate API/CLI KEY".

setApiKey.hasKey: Do you have your API key already?
setApiKey.invalid: The provided API key is not valid.
setApiKey.success: Your API key has been successfuly registered!

delete.cancelled: The delete process has been cancelled.
delete.confirm: Enter the application name to confirm that you want to delete it.

commit.error: An error ocurred when trying to commit.
commit.fileOrFolder: What do you want to commit?
commit.restart: Would you like to restart your application?
commit.useGitIgnore: No squarecloud.ignore file found. Ignore .gitignore listed files instead?

createConfig.botOrSite: Is your application a Bot or a Website?
createConfig.optional: Do you want to set {{field}} for your application?

prompt.displayName: Type a display name for your application.

description.title: Write the description for your application.

main.title: What's the main file of your application?
main.invalid: This file does not exists in the current folder.

memory.title: How much RAM memory will your application use? {{max}}
memory.validate: Please type a number bigger than {{minValue}} and smaller than your available memory.

prompt.version: What version would you like to use for this application?
prompt.subdomain: Type a subdomain for your website.

start.title: Type the start command for your application.

uploadWorkspace.createFile: To upload your application, first create a configuration file.

error.duplicateKey: Your Square Cloud configuration file has 2 "{{key}}" settings.
error.missingKey: The property "{{key}}" is missing from your configuration file but is required to host your application.

long.displayName: The DISPLAY_NAME field cannot exceed 32 characters.
long.description: The DESCRIPTION field cannot exceed 280 characters.
long.subdomain: The SUBDOMAIN field cannot exceed 62 characters.
long.start: The START field can only have up to 128 characters.

invalid.mainFile: The MAIN file "{{file}}" does not exist in your project.
invalid.memory: The MEMORY field must be a value in MB greater than or equal to {{memory}}.
invalid.autoRestart: The AUTORESTART field must be "true" or "false".
invalid.version: The VERSION field only allows "recommended" or "latest".
invalid.subdomain: Invalid SUBDOMAIN. Only alphanumeric characters and hyphens are allowed.

missing.displayName: You need to provide a valid DISPLAY_NAME with up to 32 characters.
missing.description: You need to provide a valid description with up to 280 characters. If you don't want to, just remove the DESCRIPTION field.
missing.subdomain: You need to provide a valid subdomain to host a web application (site, API). If that's not your intention, just remove the SUBDOMAIN field.
missing.start: You need to provide a start command. If that's not your intention, just remove the START field.
missing.main: You need to provide a valid main file. This is the main file of your application, where everything starts!

unavailable.memory: You are out of available memory. Consider upgrading at https://squarecloud.app/pay?state=upgrade
